He regrets his inappropriate remarks.
后悔无及
hòuhuǐwújí 
too late to repent
事已至此，后悔也没有用了。
Shì yǐ zhìcǐ，hòuhuǐ yě méiyǒu yòng le。
There is no room for regret when matters have reached this stage. or Now it\'s done, regrets are no use.
瞅准机会就要主动出手，否则后悔晚矣。
Chǒuzhǔn jīhuì jiùyào zhǔdòng chūshǒu，fǒuzé hòuhuǐ wǎnyǐ。
Once you find your chance, you should take initiative or you will lose it.
世上没有卖后悔药的，早知今日，何必当初！
Shìshàng méiyǒu mài hòuhuǐyào de，zǎozhī jīnrì，hébì dāngchū！
There is no medicine to cure regret in the world. You shouldn\'t have behaved like that in the beginning when you knew what the result would be.
警察抓他时他非常后悔，但已是江心补漏，为时已晚。
Jǐngchá zhuā tā shí tā fēicháng hòuhuǐ，dàn yǐshì jiāngxīn bǔlòu，wéishí yǐwǎn。
He felt deeply regretful when he was arrested by the police, but it was too late for him to mend his ways.
你把金玉良言当作耳旁风，总有一天会后悔的。
Nǐ bǎ jīnyù liángyán dàngzuò ěrpángfēng，zǒng yǒu yìtiān huì hòuhuǐ de。
You regard the beneficial words as a puff of wind, and will regret it sooner or later.
他续娶的妻子很凶悍，他有点后悔。

If you don\'t work hard now you\'ll regret it in the future.
他起初同意，过后又翻悔了。
Tā qǐchū tóngyì，guòhòu yòu fānhuǐ le。
At first he agreed, but later he backed out.
涟洏不绝，悔之晚矣，这告诉我们做事要三思而后行。
Liánér bùjué，huǐzhī wǎnyǐ，zhè gàosù wǒmen zuòshì yào sānsī ér hòuxíng。
It is too late to regret with eyes full of tears. It tells us we must think carefully before we take action.

你再想想，主意一但拿定就别反悔了，开弓可没有回头箭！

You\'d better think it through again: once decided, you can\'t change your mind any more. Once the arrow is shot, you can never take it back.
答应别人的事可不能反悔。

决不反悔

一经答应，就别翻悔。
Yì jīng dāyìng，jiù bié fānhuǐ。
Once you\'ve given your word, don\'t try to back out.
他起初同意，过后又翻悔了。
Tā qǐchū tóngyì，guòhòu yòu fānhuǐ le。
At first he agreed, but later he backed out.
你两人一言为定，各无翻悔。
Nǐ liǎngrén yìyánwéidìng，gè wú fānhuǐ。
Now that you have both agreed to this, you must neither of you go back on your word.
她说和我一起去，可又翻悔了。
Tā shuō hé wǒ yìqǐqù，kě yòu fānhuǐle。
She said she\'d go with me, but then backed out.
现在要翻悔你的承诺为时已晚。
Xiànzài yào fānhuǐ nǐde chéngnuò wéishíyǐwǎn。
It\'s too late to go back on your promise.

照咱们这样儿讨论下去，可就把问题泛化了。

Guójiā jīngguò xuǎnliú，péiyǎng le yì pī yǔhángyuán。
Through selection, the state has retained and trained a group of astronauts.
宇航器的出现为我们探索太空提供了可能。
Yǔhángqì de chūxiàn wèi wǒmen tànsuǒ tàikōng tígōng le kěnéng。
The shape of a spaceship makes it possible for us to explore outerspace.
所有宇航员都必须经过严格的体能训练。
Suǒyǒu yǔhángyuán dōu bìxū jīngguò yángé de tǐnéng xùnliàn。
All astronauts must go through strict physical training.
在地球上，仅通过肉眼是看不到宇宙空间的。
Zài dìqiúshàng，jǐn tōngguò ròuyǎn shì kànbúdào yǔzhòu kōngjiān de。
On  earth, people can\'t see outerspace with their bare eyes.
他虽已年过六十，但依然气宇轩昂、精神焕发。
Tā suī yǐ niánguò liùshí，dàn yīrán qìyǔ xuānáng、jīngshén huànfā。
Although he is over 60, he still has a dignified appearance and looks in high spirits.
通过高倍太空望远镜可以清楚地看到宇宙尘。
Tōngguò gāobèi tàikōng wàngyuǎnjìng kěyǐ qīngchu de kàndào yǔzhòuchén。
Through high-power space telescopes, people can see cosmic dust clearly.
我们应该在实践中不断改造自己的宇宙观。
Wǒmen yīnggāi zài shíjiàn zhōng búduàn gǎizào zìjǐ de yǔzhòuguān。
Through practice, we should make continuous adjustments to our world view .
宇宙射线有时候也会对地球产生影响。
Yǔzhòu shèxiàn yǒushíhou yě huì duì dìqiú chǎnshēng yǐngxiǎng。
Sometimes, cosmic rays affect the earth.
宇宙浩瀚无边。
Yǔzhòu hàohànwúbiān。
The universe is limitless.

Tā huànxiǎng chéngwéi yǔhángyuán.

A cosmological argument is an argument that the universe demands the admission of an adequate external cause which is god.
Yí gè yǔzhòu zhéxué de lùndiǎn shì，yǔzhòu xūyào yí gè chōngfèn wàiyīn jí shàngdì de rènkě。
一个宇宙哲学的论点是，宇宙需要一个充分外因即上帝的认可。
The first earth satellite marked a new epoch in the study of the universe.
第一个地球卫星标志了宇宙研究的新纪元。

宇宙科学采用了许多新词。

她是首个登月球探险的女宇航员。

宇宙飞船的取样器收集到很多月球的土壤样品。
Earth was believed to be one of the four elements in the universe.

别老闷在屋里看书，出来活动活动。
Bié lǎo mēn zài wūlǐ kànshū，chūlái huódònghuódòng。
Don\'t shut yourself indoors reading all day long. Come outside and stretch your legs.
我看快下雨了，天这么闷热。
Wǒ kàn kuài xiàyǔ le，tiān zhème mēnrè。
I think it\'s going to rain—it\'s so sultry.
她闷声不响只管干活。
Tā mēnshēngbùxiǎngzhǐguǎn gànhuó。
She kept silent, concentrating on her work.
闷头儿干
mēntóur gàn 
work doggedly in silence; plod away silently
你一个人在这儿多闷得慌，跟我们出去走走吧！
Nǐ yígèrén zài zhèr duō mèn de huang，gēn wǒmen chūqù zǒuzǒu ba。
Don\'t you feel bored staying here all alone? Why not come out with us for a walk?
闷屋子住着憋气。
Mènwūzi zhù zhe biēqì。
I feel suffocated in a tightly closed room.
觉得胸口闷堵
jué de xiōngkǒu mèndǔ 
feel a tightness in the chest
这几句没头没脑的话真把人装进闷葫芦里了。
Zhè jǐ jù méitóuméinǎo de huà zhēn bǎ rén zhuāngjìn mènhúlu lǐ le。
These abrupt remarks were really a puzzle to everyone.
生闷气
shēngmènqì 
be sulky; be in the sulks
家里一个人也没有，他心里很纳闷。
Jiā lǐ yígèrén yě méiyǒu，tā xīnlǐ hěn nàmèn。
He was surprised to find nobody at home.
天气闷热难堪。
Tiānqì mēnrè nánkān。
It was terribly hot and sultry.
闷杀人
mēnshā rén
bored to death
屋里太闷热，出去松散松散吧。
Wūlǐ tài mēnrè，chūqù sōngsan sōngsan ba。
It\'s too hot and stuffy in here. Let\'s go out for a breath of air.
屋子太闷了，打开窗子透透气。
Wūzi tài mēn le，dǎkāi chuāngzi tòutouqì。
The room is too stuffy. Open the windows and let some air in.
心里发闷
xīnlǐ fāmèn
feel constriction in the area of the heart
郁结在心头的烦闷
yùjié zài xīntóu de fánmèn 
worries pent up inside one
郁闷之感
yùmèn zhīgǎn 
a feeling of oppression
遭到意外打击，他感觉挨闷棍似的难受。

It was such an unexpected twist of events, that he felt like was hit on the head.
他一天到晚在家闷着不动窝，长了不少肉。
Tā yìtiān dào wǎn zài jiā mèn zhe búdòngwō，zhǎng le bùshǎo ròu。
He gained a lot of weight staying in doors all day.
不要让自己闷坐愁城，应当让自己开心起来。
Búyào ràng zìjǐ mènzuò chóuchéng，yīngdāng ràng zìjǐ kāixīn qǐlái。
You should cheer up, don\'t act so dejected.
当朋友感到郁闷的时候，我们当一下出气筒也没什么不可以。
Dāng péngyou gǎndào yùmèn de shíhou，wǒmen dāng yíxià chūqìtǒng yě méi shénme bùkěyǐ。
When our friends are depressed it isn\'t a big problem if they vent their anger in our direction.
他在心中打闷雷，想着这到底是怎么回事。
Tā zài xīn zhōng dǎ mènléi，xiǎng zhe zhè dàodǐ shì zěnme huí shì。
He makes random guesses, and then wonders what the hell has happened.
炎热的天气让人觉得胸口发闷。
Yánrè de tiānqì ràng rén jué de xiōngkǒu fāmèn。
The hot weather in summer makes me feel suffocated.
你今天说话声音有些发闷，是不是感冒了？

Your voice is a bit muffled, have you got a cold?
遇到这么多烦心事，我能不发闷吗？

How can I be happy when faced with so many troubles?

Whenever he is in a bad mood, he drinks to drown his sorrows.

People dressed in dark look even more depressing.
每当她烦恼郁闷时，我总是来开解安慰她。

Every time she was gloomy, I would comfort her and straighten her out.
他感到四肢不能动弹了，可能是中了闷香。
Tā gǎndào sìzhī bùnéng dòngtán le，kěnéng shì zhòng le mènxiāng。
He felt his arms and legs tingling, and knew that he may have inhaled narcotic incense.
那个闷罐儿里腌制着一些白菜。

There is some bloated cabbage in the airtight pot.
这些货物都是用闷罐车运输的，绝对安全。

他一直闷坐在那个沙发上，抽了不少烟。

shèhuìzhǔyì mínzhǔ hé shèhuìzhǔyì fǎzhì bùkě fēngē。

收割小麦
shōugē xiǎomài
gather in the wheat
她听到这不幸的消息心如刀割。
Tā tīngdào zhè búxìng de xiāoxi xīnrúdāogē。
The sad news stabbed her to the heart.
布谷鸟一叫，乡亲们都知道要割麦子了。
Bùgǔniǎo yí jiào，xiāngqīnmen dōu zhīdào yào gēmàizi le。
The farmers know it is time to reap their crops when the cuckoo sings.
这把刀子是用来割韭菜的。
Zhèbǎ dāozi shì yònglái gē jiǔcài de。
This pocket knife is used to cut chives.
导体切割磁场会产生电子流。
Dǎotǐ qiēgē cíchǎng huì chǎnshēng diànzǐliú。
Electronic currents appear when a conductor cuts magnetic field lines.
他收割完地里的玉米，开始准备冬小麦的播种。
Tā shōugē wán dìlǐ de yùmǐ，kāishǐ zhǔnbèi dōngxiǎomài de bōzhòng。
He embarked on the preparations for planting winter wheat immediately after he had finished harvesting corn.
中国任人宰割，任人侵略的日子一去不复返了。
Zhōngguó rènrén zǎigē，rènrén qīnlüè de rìzi yíqù bú fùfǎn le。
The days when the Chinese were invaded and exploited have gone.
晚清政府的无能使得我们一再的割地、赔款。
Wǎnqīng zhèngfǔ de wúnéng shǐdé wǒmen yízài de gēdì、péikuǎn。
The incompetence of the government of the late Qing dynasty made us cede territories and pay indemnities again and again.
割鸡焉用牛刀？你留下吧，让小王去处理这件事就可以了。
Gējī yānyòng niúdāo？ Nǐ liúxià ba，ràng Xiǎo Wáng qù chǔlǐ zhèjiànshì jiù kěyǐ le。
Why use an ox-cleaver to kill a chicken? You stay here and let Xiao Wang deal with this.
养蜂人正在割蜜。
Yǎngfēngrén zhèngzài gēmì。
The beekeeper is cutting off the honey comb in order to get honey.
工人们正在割漆，中午才能休息。
Gōngrénmen zhèngzài gēqī，zhōng wǔ cáinéng xiūxi。
The workers are tapping lacquer trees, they won\'t have a rest until midday.
把不能穿的旧衣服割弃了吧。
Bǎ bùnéng chuān de jiùyīfu gēqì le ba。
Throw away those worn clothes.
把这些肉割切成片。
Bǎ zhèxiēròu gēqiē chéngpiàn。
Chop this meat into pieces.
这次你必须割肉，否则事情无法解决。
Zhècì nǐ bìxū gēròu，fǒuzé shìqing wúfǎ jiějué。
You have to give way this time, otherwise the problem will not be solved.
沙俄曾割占中国东北和西北的大片领土。
Shāé céng gēzhān Zhōngguó dōngběi hé xīběi de dàpiàn lǐngtǔ。
The tsar used to separate and occupy a vast territory of northeast and northwest China.
肿瘤一定要割治治疗吗？
Zhǒngliú yídìng yào gēzhì zhìliáo ma？
Do we have to cure tumors by excision?
人家都挂镰了，咱这还有这么多没割。
Rénjiā dōu guàlián le，zán zhè háiyǒu zhèmeduō méigē。
They have already finished their work, but we still have so much left.
这两件事是有关连的，不能割裂开来。
Zhè liǎng jiàn shì shì yǒu guānlián de，bùnéng gēliè kāilái。
These two things are interrelated and shouldn\'t be treated separately.
新承包的这片橡胶园，终于到了可以开割的时候。
Xīn chéngbāo de zhèpiàn xiàng jiāoyuán，zhōng yú dào le kěyǐ kāigē de shíhou。
We are finally able to tap this new rubber plantation.
又到了忙碌的夏收时节，小麦该开割了。
Yòu dào le mánglù de xiàshōu shíjié，xiǎomài gāi kāigē le。
Another busy summer harvesting time has arrived. It is time to reap the wheat.
她牙齿不太好，要将东西脔割后才能食用。
Tā yáchǐ bú tài hào，yào jiāng dōngxi luángē hòu cáinéng shíyòng。
He has bad teeth, and can only eat diced food.
下个月就是麦季了，我要回家收割麦子。
Xià gè yuè jiùshì màijì le，wǒ yào huíjiā shōugē màizi。
The wheat harvest season will come next month, and I will go home to reap wheat.
他是个麦客，每年都要去帮别人收割麦子。
Tā shì gè màikè，měinián dōuyào qù bāng biérén shōugē màizi。
He is a migrant wheat harvester, and reaps wheat for others every year.
今年收割上来的麦粒非常饱满。
Jīnnián shōugē shànglái de màilì fēicháng bǎomǎn。
The grains of wheat are plump this year.
他把刚刚收割下来的麦子堆在麦垄上。
Tā bǎ gānggāng shōugē xiàlái de màizi duīzài màilǒng shàng。
He piles newly reaped wheat on the ridges.
忙月的时候我们需要大量的劳动力来收割庄稼。
Mángyuè de shíhou wǒmen xūyào dàliàng de láodònglì lái shōugē zhuāngjià。
In busy months, we need a large labour force to reap the harvest.
秋收时我们从农机站租了一台大型收割机。

我家都已经摊场了，他家的麦子还没收割完。
Wǒjiā dōu yǐjing tānchǎng le，tā jiā de màizi hái méi shōugē wán。

我不小心被剃须刀割破了手指。
Wǒ bùxiǎoxīn bèi tìxūdāo gēpò le shǒuzhǐ。

Tàijiān dōushì bèi yān le gē yángjù de nánrén。

有些种子在收割和播种之间需要一段寒冷期。
A good solution to the weather problems is to harvest the crop early in September.

All cuts should be at an angle of between 40 to 65 degrees.

夸耀说…
Where the silver light starts, at the foot of whitely blue Mont Blanc, were five riders.
在银光照耀之处，苍白的勃朗峰脚处，有五位骑马的旅人刚好出现。

鸟儿求偶的表现包括雄鸟抖松羽毛的炫耀行为。
Victor knew that Roosevelt liked to display his memory.
维克多知道罗斯福喜欢炫耀他的记性。
She hurried to the far end of the bay where the sun gazed from above the cliff.
Tā gǎnwǎng hǎiwān de yuǎnduān，nàlǐ shì tàiyáng páshàng qiàobì zhàoyàozhe de dìfang。
她赶往海湾的远端，那里是太阳爬上峭壁照耀着的地方。
The sun was blazing down and there was hardly a cloud in the sky.
Yángguāng zhàoyàozhe dàdì，tiānkōng wànlǐwúyún。
阳光照耀着大地，天空万里无云。
This is an experience you will brag to your friends about.
Zhè shì yí cì nǐ kěyǐ xiàng péngyǒumen xuànyào de jīnglì le。
这是一次你可以向朋友们炫耀的经历了。
The bride wore a stunning red dress.
Xīnniáng chuānzhe yìxí yàoyǎn de hóngsè nǚzhuāng。
新娘穿着一袭耀眼的红色女装。
Among children, having the newest toy is a badge of honor.
Zài háizǐmen zhōngjiān，yōngyǒu zuìxīn de wánjù shì yì zhǒng róngyào de biāozhì。
在孩子们中间，拥有最新的玩具是一种荣耀的标志。
The sun shone out of a clear blue sky.
Tàiyáng zài qínglǎng de lántiān shàng shǎnyàozhe guāngmáng。
太阳在晴朗的蓝天上闪耀着光芒。
Even if you score a triumph, you should avoid crowing about your success.
Jíshǐ nǐ qǔdéle shènglì，yě yīnggāi bìmiǎn kuāyào zìjǐ de chénggōng。
即使你取得了胜利，也应该避免夸耀自己的成功。
The regiment showed off its first female recruit yesterday.
Gāi tuán zuótiān xuànyàole qí dì-yī wèi nǚ xīnbīng。
该团昨天炫耀了其第一位女新兵。
The sun was warm on her back and the light sparkled on the water.
Tàiyáng wēnnuǎn le tā de bèi yángguāng zài shuǐ lǐ shǎnyào。
太阳温暖了她的背，阳光在水里闪耀。
They screwed up their eyes, trying to get used to the glare.
Tāmen zhǎbāzhe yǎnjing，shìtú shìyìng zhè shǎnyào guāngmáng。
他们眨巴着眼睛，试图适应这闪耀光芒。
The sun was radiant in a perfectly clear blue sky above us.
Tàiyáng wǒmen tóudǐng shàng chúnjìng de lánsè tiānkōng lǐ fāchū yàoyǎn de guāngmáng。
太阳我们头顶上纯净的蓝色天空里发出耀眼的光芒。
His enjoyment of music now led him into more theatrical pursuits.
Tā duì yīnyuè de rè\'ài shǐ tā chéngwéi xiànzài xuànyào de shìqing。
他对音乐的热爱使他成为现在炫耀的事情。
We observed a few flares on the sun\'s surface.
Wǒmen guānchále yìxiē tàiyáng biǎomiàn de yàobān。
我们观察了一些太阳表面的耀斑。
A flash of lightning lit up the dark sky.
Yí dào yàoyǎn de shǎndiàn zhàoliàngle hēi\'àn de tiānkōng。
一道耀眼的闪电照亮了黑暗的天空。
My brother loves to flash his jewelry to the girls around the neighborhood.
Wǒ xiōngdi xǐhuan xiàng línjū de nǚhái xuànyào tā de zhūbǎo。
我兄弟喜欢向邻居的女孩炫耀他的珠宝。
He blazed abroad all that he has seen and heard.
Tā kuāyào suǒyǒu tā kàndào hé tīngdào de dōngxi。
他夸耀所有他看到和听到的东西。
He was crowned with glory and honor.
Tā dédàole róngyào hé róngyù。
他得到了荣耀和荣誉。
He distinguished himself by his devoted attention to detail.
Tā xuànyào zìjǐ zhùzhòng xìjié。
他炫耀自己注重细节。
He never fetches out his books with me.
Tā cóngwèi zài wǒ miànqián xuànyào guò tā de shū。
他从未在我面前炫耀过他的书。
He keeps flashing about the boat he just bought.
Tā yìzhí zài xuànyào tā gāng mǎi de chuán。
他一直在炫耀他刚买的船。
A strobe light flashed out the dance floor.
Shǎnguāngdēng shǎnyàozhe wǔchí。
闪光灯闪耀着舞池。
They shall all at last be gathered to Shiloh，their glorious Redeemer.
Tāmen zuìhòu dōu xiàng Xiàtèluò jùlǒng，xiàng tāmen róngyào de jiùshìzhǔ jùlǒng。
他们最后都向夏特洛聚拢，向他们荣耀的救世主聚拢。
I simply don\'t get out much to enjoy my success.
Wǒ bù cānjiā shèjiāohuódòng，dàochù xuànyào wǒ de nà duàn chénggōngshǐ。
我不参加社交活动，到处炫耀我的那段成功史。
I had to guard against any display of triumph.
Wǒ děi rěnzhù bú qù xuànyào shènglì。
我得忍住不去炫耀胜利。
He was making a parade of the influence he possessed over his wife.
Tā shì zài xuànyào tā duì tā qīzǐ de yǐngxiǎnglì。
他是在炫耀他对他妻子的影响力。
How many young minds will you poison with your wild dreams of glory?
Nǐ fēngkuáng zhuīzhú róngyào de mèngxiǎng dúhài duōshǎo niánqīngrén？
你疯狂追逐荣耀的梦想毒害多少年轻人？
It has been recently restored to its former glory.
Zuìjìn，tā yòu huīfùle tā xīrì de róngyào。
最近，它又恢复了它昔日的荣耀。
He would always try to show off in front of her.
Tā zǒngshì shìtú zài tā miànqián xuànyào。
他总是试图在她面前炫耀。
None surpassed him in rank and glory.
Méiyǒu rén zài dìwèi hé róngyào fāngmiàn chāoguò tā。
没有人在地位和荣耀方面超过他。
You have surrendered to him for his glory.
Nǐ yǐ bèi tā de róngyào suǒ zhéfú。
你已被他的荣耀所折服。

Fùrén xuànyào de shēnghuó fāngshì jīqǐle qióngrén de chóuhèn。
富人炫耀的生活方式激起了穷人的仇恨。
She relished her fame and basked in her glory.
Tā xiǎngshòuzhe míngshēng hé róngyào。
她享受着名声和荣耀。

Chúchuāng lǐ zhūbǎo shǎnyào。
橱窗里珠宝闪耀。
The results promised fame and glory.

这些结果预示着声誉和荣耀。
She was sporting a new hat.
Tā zài xuànyào yī dǐng xīnmàozi。
她在炫耀一顶新帽子。
She parades her new husband around town.
Tā Mǎnchéng xuànyào tā de xīnrèn zhàngfu。
她满城炫耀他的新任丈夫。

Méikuài zài hēi\'àn zhōng shǎnyào。
煤块在黑暗中闪耀。
She shows her dogs frequently.
Tā jīngcháng xuànyào tā de gǒu。
她经常炫耀她的狗。
These great best canvases still look as astonishing and as invitingly new as they did...when...his fulgurant popularity was in full growth.
Zhèxiē wěidà de zuì jiā yóuhuà zuòpǐn kànqǐlái réngjiù lìngrén jīngtàn，réngjiù xiàng zuìchū huà chūlái shí nàme xīnxiān dòngrén …… Nàshí tā xīnghuī shǎnyào，shēngwàng jí gāo，chǔyú quánshèngshíqī。

The rays of the sun struck the earth mellowingly.

His behavior was an outrageous flaunt.

他的行为是一种无耻的炫耀。

她闭上昏眩的眼睛以躲避耀眼的阳光。
She shouted triumphantly.
Tā xuànyào de hǎnzhe。
她炫耀地喊着。
Everything redounded to his glory.

Tā hěn kuāyào de miáoshùle zìjǐ suǒ qǔdé de chéngjì。

荣耀
róngyào
honour; glory
封建时代，后宫的妃子都以得到皇上的宠幸为荣耀。
Fēngjiàn shídài，hòugōng de fēizǐ dōu yǐ dédào huángshàng de chǒngxìng wéi róngyào。
In feudal society, imperial concubines took grate pride in winning the emperors favor.
能够担任礼兵是我的荣耀。
Nénggòu dānrèn lǐbīng shì wǒ de róngyào。
I am very honored to be a protocol soldier.

光耀门庭
guāngyàoméntíng
bring glory to the family name

舞台上的灯光由淡黄色渐变成耀眼的红色。

The dramatic lighting gradually turns from light yellow to glaring red.
她穿着一件红色光面儿羽绒服，在雪地里非常耀眼。
Tā chuān zhe yíjiàn hóngsè guāngmiànr yǔróngfú，zài xuědì lǐ fēicháng yàoyǎn。
She is dressed in a red clear-face feather jacket and looks very bright in the snow.

耀眼的阳光。
Where the silver light starts, at the foot of whitely blue Mont Blanc, were five riders.
在银光照耀之处，苍白的勃朗峰脚处，有五位骑马的旅人刚好出现。
The sun was blazing down and there was hardly a cloud in the sky.
Yángguāng zhàoyàozhe dàdì，tiānkōng wànlǐwúyún。
阳光照耀着大地，天空万里无云。
They screwed up their eyes, trying to get used to the glare.
Tāmen zhǎbāzhe yǎnjing，shìtú shìyìng zhè shǎnyào guāngmáng。
他们眨巴着眼睛，试图适应这闪耀光芒。
A strobe light flashed out the dance floor.
Shǎnguāngdēng shǎnyàozhe wǔchí。
闪光灯闪耀着舞池。
The sun shone out of a clear blue sky.
Tàiyáng zài qínglǎng de lántiān shàng shǎnyàozhe guāngmáng。
太阳在晴朗的蓝天上闪耀着光芒。
The sun was warm on her back and the light sparkled on the water.
Tàiyáng wēnnuǎn le tā de bèi yángguāng zài shuǐ lǐ shǎnyào。
太阳温暖了她的背，阳光在水里闪耀。
The sun was radiant in a perfectly clear blue sky above us.
Tàiyáng wǒmen tóudǐng shàng chúnjìng de lánsè tiānkōng lǐ fāchū yàoyǎn de guāngmáng。
太阳我们头顶上纯净的蓝色天空里发出耀眼的光芒。
Hills constellated with lights.
Shān shàng dàochù shǎnyàozhe dēngguāng。
山上到处闪耀着灯光。
strong light
耀眼的强光
The rays of the sun struck the earth mellowingly.
Tàiyáng de guāngxiàn róuhé de zhàoyàozhe dàdì。
太阳的光线柔和地照耀着大地。
She shut her dazzled eyes against the sun\'s brilliance.
Tā bìshàng hūnxuàn de yǎnjing yǐ duǒbì yàoyǎn de yángguāng。
她闭上昏眩的眼睛以躲避耀眼的阳光。
His eyes shone with happiness.
他的眼睛里闪耀着幸福的光芒。
sunlight playing on the waves
照耀在水波面上的阳光
他为官勤政爱民，取得了许多成绩。
Tā wéiguān qínzhèng àimín，qǔdé le xǔduō chéngjì。

政绩斐然
政绩如何，要靠群众评判。

医学界的最新业绩
yīxuéjiè de zuì xīn yèjì
the latest achievements in medical science

The great achievements of revolutionary heroes inspire us to move forward forever.
他业绩这么好，也不枉你对他的培养。

His outstanding performance makes him worthy of your cultivation.

The performance of the company recently has been excellent.
没有诸方公助，我的企业就不会有如此业绩。
Méiyǒu zhūfāng gōngzhù，wǒ de qǐyè jiù búhuì yǒu rúcǐ yèjì。
Without the collective financial aid provided by all parties, my enterprise would never made such good achievements.
小周因为业绩不好被降职了。

Xiao Zhou has been demoted due to his poor performance.
我们要奖励那些业绩特出的人。

We must reward those with outstanding performance.

deeds that reflect honor on him
给他带来荣誉的业绩

the firm is doing well
这个公司业绩良好

别再吹你自己在这项计划中的业绩了。
It was a fair performance that didn\'t deserve any praise or criticism.

这个业绩很普通，不值得表扬或者批评。
There is an yearly performance evaluation.
Měinián dōu huì jìnxíng yícì yèjì pínggū。
每年都会进行一次业绩评估。
Performance went down over the course of the year.
Quánnián yèjì zhíxiàn xiàjiàng。
全年业绩直线下降。
The stocks were downgraded based on their bad performance.
Yóuyú tāmen zāogāo de yèjì，gǔpiào biǎnzhí le。
由于他们糟糕的业绩，股票贬值了。
The key evidence of success is the financial results.
Chénggōng de zhǔyào zhèngmíng shì yèjì。
成功的主要证明是业绩。
The criteria against which to measure success are termed performance indicators.
Yònglái héngliáng chénggōng de biāozhǔn chēngwéi yèjì zhǐbiāo。
用来衡量成功的标准称为业绩指标。
I have not been graded on my performance evaluation.
Hái méiyǒu duì de wǒ de yèjì pínggū dǎfēn。
还没有对的我的业绩评估打分。
The energy giant\'s third quarter results，unveiled yesterday，were disappointing with losses of $50m.
Zuótiān gōngbù de néngyuán jùtóu dì-sān jìdù yèjì xiǎnshì jùkuī gāodá wǔqiān wàn měijīn，zhè bùmiǎn lìng rén dàshīsuǒwàng。
昨天公布的能源巨头第三季度业绩显示巨亏高达5000万美金，这不免令人大失所望。
The weekly bulletin contains several predictors of mutual fund performance.
Zhōubào zhōng bāohán jǐgè yǒuguān gòngtóng jījīn yèjì de yùcèzhí。
周报中包含几个有关共同基金业绩的预测值。
Quarterly reporting is already the norm on the mainland.
zài Zhōngguó Nèidì，jìdù yèjìbàogào yǐ chéngwéi biāozhǔn。
在中国内地，季度业绩报告已成为标准。
State corporations are immune from bankruptcy and not obliged to publish results.

He graduated cum laude.

Michael graduated with distinction from the university.

fēnggōngwěijì
great achievements; signal contributions
他的伟大功绩不可磨灭。

考试成绩优异
kǎoshì chénɡjì yōuyì 
do exceedingly well in an examination
他的考试成绩跟及格线擦边。
Tā de kǎoshì chéngjì gēn jígéxiàn cābiān。
He passed the exam by a narrow margin.
由于考试成绩不佳，他被这所高校拒之门外。
Yóuyú kǎoshì chéngjì bùjiā，tā bèi zhè suǒ gāoxiào jùzhīménwài。
He was refused by the college because of his bad examination results.
小明的期中考试成绩很好，受到老师表扬。
Xiǎo Míng de qī zhōng kǎoshì chéngjì hěnhǎo，shòudào lǎoshī biǎoyáng。
Xiao Ming got high marks in the mid-term exam, and was praised by the teacher.
他的考试成绩在全班后十名。
Tāde kǎoshìchéngjì zài quánbān hòushímíng。
His test mark puts him in the last ten of the class.
考试成绩良好
kǎoshìchéngjì liánghǎo
good exam results
他在期终考试中，科第成绩平均都在90分。
Tā zài qī zhōng kǎoshì zhōng，kēdì chéngjì píngjūn dōu zài jiǔshífēn。
In the final exams, his average grade was above 90 points.
明天就要进考场了，试看咱们谁能考出更好的成绩。
Míngtiān jiùyào jìn kǎochǎng le，shìkàn zánmen shéi néng kǎochū gènghǎo de chéngjì。
We\'ll take the examination tomorrow, and let\'s see who can get a higher mark.
在老师的关怀下，这次考试我取得了良好的成绩。
Zài lǎoshī de guānhuái xià，zhècì kǎoshì wǒ qǔdé le liánghǎo de chéngjì。
Thanks to my teacher\'s concern I got good results in the exam.
小明的数学成绩不太好，每次考试都让他很犯难。
Xiǎo Míng de shùxué chéngjì bú tài hǎo，měi cì kǎoshì dōu ràng tā hěn fànnán。
Xiao Ming is not good at math and feels perplexed in each math exam.
考试前，同学们互勉着，祝愿彼此取得好成绩。
Kǎoshì qián，tóngxuémen hùmiǎn zhe，zhùyuàn bǐcǐ qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
Before the exam, the students encouraged each other and wished each other a good score.
Our exam scores were even.
我们的考试成绩大致相当。
To my surprise, my exam results are very good.
让我惊喜的是，我的期末考试成绩很好。
I\'ll telephone you when I get any information about the results of the exam.
Dāng wǒ dédào rènhé yǒuguān kǎoshìchéngjì de xiāoxi shí，wǒ huì dǎdiànhuà tōngzhī nǐ。
当我得到任何有关考试成绩的消息时，我会打电话通知你。
I still don\'t know the results of the boards I took last month.
我还不知道上个月那场考试的成绩。
Many students do badly on their first physics test.
很多学生第一次物理考试的成绩都不是很理想。
Students must take count of their exams in order to do well on them.
Wèile kǎo chū hǎo chéngjì，xuésheng bìxū zhòngshì tāmen de kǎoshì。
为了考出好成绩，学生必须重视他们的考试。
He improved his grade after doing well on the last exam.
自从上次考试表现不俗之后，他的成绩就开始提高了。
She passed all tests with distinction.
Tā yǐ yōuyì de chéngjì tōngguò suǒyǒu de kǎoshì。
她以优异的成绩通过所有的考试。
Passing grades account for half of the grades given in this exam.
Chéngjì wéi“tōngguò”de xuésheng zài zhè cì kǎoshì zhōng zhànle yíbàn。
成绩为“通过”的学生在这次考试中占了一半。
Some students are in the wrong level because they fake out the testers or get lucky.
Yǒuxiē tóngxué de chéngjì bìng bù zhēnshí，yīnwèi tāmen qīpiànle kǎoshì rényuán，huòzhě hěn xìngyùn。
有些同学的成绩并不真实，因为他们欺骗了考试人员，或者很幸运。
我们依据《公务员考绩法》对本单位的公务员进行了考核。
Wǒmen yījù《Gōngwùyuán kǎojìfǎ》duì běn dānwèi de gōngwùyuán jìnxíng le kǎohé。
According to the Regulations on Assessing the Work of Civil Servants, we examined the civil servants in our unit.
考学时谁不想考个好成绩、考上个好学校呢？
Kǎoxué shí shéi bùxiǎng kǎo gè hǎo chéngjì、kǎoshàng gè hǎo xuéxiào ne？
When taking the entrance examination, who does not want to have a good result and get into a good school?
等待高考成绩的日子，真是寸阴若岁。
Děngdài gāokǎo chéngjì de rìzi，zhēnshì cùnyīn ruòsuì。
During those days of waiting for the results of the College Entrance Exam, an inch in movement of a shadow seemed to be as long as a year.
我的高考成绩仅比录取线低6分。
Wǒ de gāokǎo chéngjì jǐn bǐ lùqūxiàn dī liùfēn。
My mark in the college entrance examination was only six marks lower than the passing mark.

成绩上佳。

他的学习成绩是拔尖儿的。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì shì bájiānr de。
He is a top-notch student.
屡遭败绩
lǚzāobàijì
be badly defeated again and again; have sustained severe defeats time and again
不要把成绩当包袱
búyào bǎ chéngjì dàng bāofu
not allow one\'s merits to become a hindrance to one\'s progress
不可磨灭的功绩
bùkěmómiè de gōngjì 
ineffaceable merit; unforgettable meritorious deeds
我们决不能一见成绩就自满起来。
Wǒmen jué bùnéng yíjiàn chéngjì jiù zìmǎn qǐlái。
We must not become complacent the moment we have some success.
在成绩面前找差距。
Zài chéngjì miànqián zhǎo chājù。

成绩不算太差。
Chéngjì búsuàn tài chà。

取得很大成绩
qǔdé hěndà chéngjì
achieve great successes
在比赛中取得良好的成绩
zài bǐsài zhōng qǔdé liánghǎo de chéngjì

xuéxí chéngjì bú tài hǎo

chénɡjì chūzhònɡ
get outstanding results in study (or work)
创造优异成绩
chuàngzào yōuyì chéngjì 
produce excellent results
先别吹，做出具体成绩来再说。
Xiān bié chuī，zuò chū jùtǐ chéngjì lái zài shuō。
Don\'t brag about what you\'re going to do. Get something done.
她在成绩面前从不骄傲。

成绩斐然
chéngjì fěirán
(achieve) splendid results

Qī fēn chéngjì，sān fēn cuòwù。
70 per cent achievements, 30 per cent mistakes
该队以两胜一负的成绩取得小组第二名。
Gāi duì yǐ liǎng shèng yífù de chéngjì qǔdé xiǎozǔ dì èr míng。
The team finished second in its group with two wins and one loss.
在老师的关怀下，这次考试我取得了良好的成绩。

Thanks to my teacher\'s concern I got good results in the exam.
该队以七战七胜的成绩摘取了本届篮球大赛的桂冠。
Gāi duì yǐ qī zhàn qī shèng de chéngjì zhāiqǔ le běn jiè lánqiú dàsài de guìguān。
With seven wins and no losses, the team won the championship of the basketball tournament.
在射箭中取得342环的成绩
zài shèjiàn zhōng qǔdé sānbǎisìshí\'èr huán de chéngjì

成绩甚佳
chénɡjì shèn jiā

Chéngjì hǎo de xuéshengkěyǐ jiǎnmiǎn xuéfèi。
Students with high marks can enjoy a partial or total tuition waiver.
他因学习成绩优秀而受到奖赏。
Tā yīn xuéxí chénɡjì yōuxiù ér shòudào jiǎnɡshǎnɡ。
He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.
考查学生成绩
kǎochá xuéshengchéngjì
check students\' work

Duì yǐjing qǔdé de chéngjì bú yào kuādàqící。

在历次比赛中她都取得了优异的成绩。

She has done well in all past contests.

按比赛成绩排列名次
àn bǐsàichéngjì páilièmíngcì
arrange the names of contestants in the order of their results

mǒshā chéngjì

zài píngfán de gǎngwèi shàngzuòchū bùpíngfán de chéngjì

成绩平平。
Chénɡjì pínɡpínɡ。

把成绩作为继续前进的新起点
bǎ chéngjì zuòwéi jìxù qiánjìn de xīnqǐdiǎn

对成绩和缺点作恰如其分的估计
duì chéngjì hé quēdiǎn zuò qiàrúqífèn de gūjì
make an appropriate estimate of the achievements and shortcomings
我们不能停留在现有的成绩上，要继续前进。
Wǒmen bùnéng tíngliú zài xiànyǒu de chéngjì shàng，yào jìxù qiánjìn。
We can\'t rest on our laurels; we must forge ahead.
别一有成绩就翘尾巴。
Bié yì yǒu chéngjì jiù qiàowěibā。
Don\'t get cocky when you\'ve achieved something.
我队以四胜两负一平的成绩获得亚军。
Wǒ duì yǐ sì shèng liǎng fù yì píng de chéngjì huòdé yàjūn。
Our team finished second with four wins, two defeats and one tie.
这本文集是他近年来创作上的实绩。
Zhèběn wénjí shì tā jìnnián lai chuàngzuòshàng de shíjì。
These collected writings embody the fruits of his creative labours in recent years.
不要躺在过去的成绩上睡大觉。
Búyào tǎngzài guòqù de chéngjì shàng shuìdàjiào。

我们不能陶醉于已取得的成绩。
Wǒmen bùnéng táozuì yú yǐ qǔdé de chéngjì。
We mustn\'t let success go to our heads.
成绩特异
chénɡjì tèyì 
an excellent record (or performance); extraordinary results

Jiàoliàn wúnéng，gāi duì lǚ zāo bàijì。

yīxuéjiè de zuì xīn yèjì

fēnggōngwěijì

zhànjì

Gémìng xiānliè yǐ biāobǐng qiānqiū de guānghuī yèjì jīlì wǒmen búduàn xiàng qián。
The great achievements of revolutionary heroes inspire us to move forward forever.
她俩在班里的学习成绩差不大离。
Tā liǎ zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì chàbúdàlí。

他虽然很努力了，但成绩还是那么不尽如人意。

Although he tried very hard, the results were not very satisfactory.
他业绩这么好，也不枉你对他的培养。

他的考试成绩跟及格线擦边。
Tā de kǎoshì chéngjì gēn jígéxiàn cābiān。

他自小聪敏好学，成绩一直遥遥领先。
Tā zì xiǎo cōngmǐn hàoxué，chéngjì yìzhí yáoyáo lǐngxiān。
He has been clever and fond of studying since he was young, and way ahead of his peers in study.
他的学习成绩凑凑合合，也不太稳定。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì còucòuhéhé，yě bú tài wěndìng。
His study is not bad, but not very consistent.

Děngdài gāokǎo chéngjì de rìzi，zhēnshì cùnyīn ruòsuì。
During those days of waiting for the results of the College Entrance Exam, an inch in movement of a shadow seemed to be as long as a year.
他的单科成绩都是优秀。
Tā de dānkē chéngjì dōushì yōuxiù。
All of his courses are excellent.
他学习成绩太差，看来只能蹲班了。
Tā xuéxí chéngjì tài chà，kàn lái zhǐnéng dūnbān le。
He lags far behind in his studies, and cannot go up to the next grade.
小明的数学成绩不太好，每次考试都让他很犯难。
Xiǎo Míng de shùxué chéngjì bú tài hǎo，měi cì kǎoshì dōu ràng tā hěn fànnán。
Xiao Ming is not good at math and feels perplexed in each math exam.
小强虽然学习成绩不好，可同学们也不应该非笑他。

Though Xiao Qiang is poor in his studies, he should not be ridiculed by his classmates.
今年高考，丽丽的成绩超过分数线很多，顺利地进入了理想中的大学。
Jīnnián gāokǎo，Lìlì de chéngjì chāoguò fēnshùxiàn hěn duō，shùnlì de jìnrù le lǐxiǎng zhōng de dàxué。
Lily\'s score was far above this year\'s cut-off mark and was successfully enrolled by her dream university.
选手们要求评委对他们的比赛成绩进行复评。
Xuǎnshǒumen yāoqiú píngwěi duì tāmen de bǐsài chéngjì jìnxíng fùpíng。
The athletes request that the judges reappraise them.
怕妈妈批评，小明改窜了他的数学成绩。
Pà māma pīpíng，Xiǎo Míng gǎicuàn le tā de shùxué chéngjì。
Xiao Ming changed his math score because he was afraid that his mom would criticize him.
没有诸方公助，我的企业就不会有如此业绩。
Méiyǒu zhūfāng gōngzhù，wǒ de qǐyè jiù búhuì yǒu rúcǐ yèjì。
Without the collective financial aid provided by all parties, my enterprise would never made such good achievements.
老师已经把连续三次都没来上课的同学在名单中勾除，他们这学期就没有成绩了。
Lǎoshī yǐjing bǎ liánxù sān cì dōu méilái shàngkè de tóngxué zài míngdān zhōng gōuchú，tāmen zhè xuéqī jiù méiyǒu chéngjì le。
The teacher has deleted from the name list the names of the students who haven\'t shown up in class three times in succession, and they will not get scores for this semester.
她这次的竞赛成绩很好，没有孤负老师对她的希望。
Tā zhè cì de jìngsài chéngjì hěnhǎo，méiyǒu gūfù lǎoshī duì tā de xīwàng。
She hasn\'t let down the teacher\'s expectations for her and has done very well in this competition.
我的这点成绩哪值得如此夸奖，先生过誉了。
Wǒ de zhè diǎn chéngjì nǎ zhídé rúcǐ kuājiǎng，xiānshēng guòyù le。
You flatter me, me achievements are not worthy of such praise.
考试前，同学们互勉着，祝愿彼此取得好成绩。
Kǎoshì qián，tóngxuémen hùmiǎn zhe，zhùyuàn bǐcǐ qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
Before the exam, the students encouraged each other and wished each other a good score.
她以优异的成绩考入护校。
Tā yǐ yōuyì de chéngjì kǎorù hùxiào。
She entered a nursing school with an excellent score.
即或是我们取得了一些成绩，也不能骄傲。
Jíhuò shì wǒmen qǔdé le yìxiē chéngjì，yě bùnéng jiāo\'ào。
We should not be conceited even if we have achieved some success.
我是高二的学生，急待提高语文成绩。
Wǒ shì gāoèr de xuésheng，jídài tígāo yǔwén chéngjì。
As a student of Grade Two at a high school, I urgently want to improve my Chinese.
由于工作成绩突出，公司奖授了他一台电脑。

He was awarded a computer for his outstanding performance in his work.
小周因为业绩不好被降职了。
Xiǎo Zhōu yīnwèi yèjì bùhǎo bèi jiàngzhí le。
Xiao Zhou has been demoted due to his poor performance.
只取得了一点小成绩他就变得很骄慢。
Zhǐ qǔdé le yìdiǎn xiǎochéngjì tā jiù biàn de hěnjiāomàn。
He became overly proud after he has made a small achievement.
只取得了一点点成绩他就开始矜功自伐。
Zhǐ qǔdé le yìdiǎndiǎn chéngjì tā jiù kāishǐ jīngōngzìfá。
He bega to flatter himself after a little achievement.
由于考试成绩不佳，他被这所高校拒之门外。
Yóuyú kǎoshì chéngjì bùjiā，tā bèi zhè suǒ gāoxiào jùzhīménwài。
He was refused by the college because of his bad examination results.
实施军民共建以来，军民之间互相帮助，出了很多成绩。
Shíshī jūnmín gòngjiàn yǐlái，jūnmín zhījiān hùxiāng bāngzhù，chū le hěnduō chéngjì。
Since the implementation of the policy of the co-construction of the army and the people, the army and the people have helped each other and have made a lot of achievements.
我们依据《公务员考绩法》对本单位的公务员进行了考核。
Wǒmen yījù《Gōngwùyuán kǎojìfǎ》duì běn dānwèi de gōngwùyuán jìnxíng le kǎohé。
According to the Regulations on Assessing the Work of Civil Servants, we examined the civil servants in our unit.
考学时谁不想考个好成绩、考上个好学校呢？
Kǎoxué shí shéi bùxiǎng kǎo gè hǎo chéngjì、kǎoshàng gè hǎo xuéxiào ne？
When taking the entrance examination, who does not want to have a good result and get into a good school?
他在期终考试中，科第成绩平均都在90分。
Tā zài qī zhōng kǎoshì zhōng，kēdì chéngjì píngjūn dōu zài jiǔshífēn。
In the final exams, his average grade was above 90 points.
今年他家因为科学养牛成绩突出而被县里评为了科技示范户。
Jīnnián tā jiā yīnwèi kēxué yǎngniú chéngjì tūchū ér bèi xiànlǐ píngwéi le kējì shìfàn hù。
This year, his family was awarded the title of scientific and technological example by the county because of their excellent performance in scientifically raising cattle.
她成绩这么优秀，可以说考上一所名牌大学是没问题的。
Tā chéngjì zhème yōuxiù，kěyǐ shuō kǎoshàng yìsuǒ míngpái dàxué shì méi wèntí de。
She does exceedingly well in her studies and should have no problem being admitted to a prestigious university.
他可着劲儿猛跑，可还是没有跑出好成绩。
Tā kě zhe jìnr měngpǎo，kě háishi méiyǒu pǎochū hǎo chéngjì。
He ran at top speed, but didn\'t get a good result.
我的学习成绩上去得很快，妈妈很宽怀！
Wǒ de xuéxí chéngjì shàngqù de hěnkuài，māma hěnkuānhuái！
Mom feels relieved that my school record has improved rapidly.
我们要打破大锅饭的体制，实行按劳绩分配，这样才能够调动大家的积极性。
Wǒmen yào dǎpò dàguōfàn de tǐzhì，shíxíng àn láojì fēnpèi，zhèyàng cái nénggòu diàodòng dàjiā de jījíxìng。
We should abandon indiscriminate egalitarianism and implement a system of distribution according to one\'s work, by which people will be enthusiastic to work.
我们中国女排之所以能够一直成绩不错是因为我们打球方式不老套，善于变化。
Wǒmen Zhōngguó nǚpái zhīsuǒyǐ nénggòu yìzhí chéngjì búcuò shì yīnwèi wǒmen dǎqiú fāngshì bùlǎotào，shànyú biànhuà。
The Chinese volleyball team can achieve good results all the time because we don\'t stick to outdated playing mode, instead we are very flexible.
由于学习成绩优秀，他被批准躐等升级。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì yōuxiù,tā bèi pīzhǔn lièděng shēngjí.
Because of excellent grades, he was approved to skip  the normal steps to go up to a higher grade.
我的高考成绩仅比录取线低6分。
Wǒ de gāokǎo chéngjì jǐn bǐ lùqūxiàn dī liùfēn。
My mark in the college entrance examination was only six marks lower than the passing mark.
他在班里的学习成绩一直都是冒尖的。
Tā zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì yìzhí dōushì màojiān de。
He has been top notch in his class.
他的学习成绩很好，总在班里名列前茅。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì hěnhǎo，zǒng zài bān lǐ mínglièqiánmáo。
He does exceedingly well in his studies, and has always been heading the class.
他学习那般刻苦，可学习成绩却依然很糟。
Tā xuéxí nàbān kèkǔ，kě xuéxí chéngjì què yīrán hěnzāo。
Though he studies hard, he performs badly.
经过教练的耐心劝导，她终于抛舍了紧张情绪，赛出了好成绩。
Jīngguò jiàoliàn de nàixīn quàndǎo，tā zhōng yú pāoshě le jǐnzhāng qíngxù，sàichū le hǎo chéngjì。
After her coach\'s patient exhortations, her pressure finally eased and she achieved a good result.
小明的期中考试成绩很好，受到老师表扬。
Xiǎo Míng de qī zhōng kǎoshì chéngjì hěnhǎo，shòudào lǎoshī biǎoyáng。
Xiao Ming got high marks in the mid-term exam, and was praised by the teacher.
为了期终能考出好成绩，我们每天都努力学习。
Wèile qī zhōng néng kǎochū hǎo chéngjì，wǒmen měitiān dōu nǔlì xuéxí。
To get high marks in the final exam, we study hard every day.
刚有了点儿成绩，他就窃窃自喜起来。
Gāng yǒu le diǎnr chéngjì，tā jiù qièqiè zìxǐ qǐlái。
He began to feel glad secretly when there was just a little achievement.
他为官勤政爱民，取得了许多成绩。
Tā wéiguān qínzhèng àimín，qǔdé le xǔduō chéngjì。
He is assiduous in government affairs, loves the people, and has made a lot of achievements.
你能有今天的成绩，不可轻忽他的帮助。
Nǐ néng yǒu jīntiān de chéngjì，bùkě qīnghū tā de bāngzhù。
You have him to thank for today\'s achievements, you shouldn\'t overlook his help.
各部门联合展开的扫黄打非活动成绩斐然。
Gè bùmén liánhé zhǎnkāi de sǎohuáng dǎfēi huódòng chéngjì fěirán。
The joint efforts of different departments to sweep illegal porno publications have achieved great success.
由于我工作成绩突出，公司赏赉给我一套新房。
Yóuyú wǒ gōngzuò chéngjì tūchū，gōngsī shǎnglài gěi wǒ yítào xīnfáng。
The company rewarded me a new department suite for my outstanding achievements.
你今年的学习成绩一定要上台阶。
Nǐ jīnnián de xuéxí chéngjì yídìng yào shàng táijiē。
You must make progress in your studies this year.
由于学习成绩下降，我被父亲申饬了。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì xiàjiàng，wǒ bèi fùqīn shēnchì le。
I was blamed by my father due to the worsening of my study.
父亲深望我能取得更好的学习成绩。
Fùqīn shēnwàng wǒ néng qǔdé gènghǎo de xuéxí chéngjì。
My father sincerely hopes that I can do better in study.
这支篮球队的胜绩已经提高到了五十场。
Zhèzhī lánqiúduì de shèngjì yǐjing tígāo dào le wǔshí chǎng。
The number of victories of this basketball team has reached 50.
他是个事务主义的领导，每天都很辛苦，但就是不见成绩。
Tā shì gè shìwùzhǔyì de lǐngdǎo，měitiān dōu hěnxīnkǔ，dàn jiùshì bújiàn chéngjì。
He is a routinist leader, who works hard every day, but without achievements.
明天就要进考场了，试看咱们谁能考出更好的成绩。
Míngtiān jiùyào jìn kǎochǎng le，shìkàn zánmen shéi néng kǎochū gènghǎo de chéngjì。
We\'ll take the examination tomorrow, and let\'s see who can get a higher mark.
他是班里的文艺骨干，但学习成绩不怎么样。
Tā shì bān lǐ de wényì gǔgàn，dàn xuéxí chéngjì bùzěnmeyàng。
He is a mainstay of literature and art in class, but doesn\'t do well in study.
在学校时，他的学习成绩数得上前10名。
Zài xuéxiào shí，tā de xuéxí chéngjì shǔdéshàng qiánshímíng。
His study results are among the top ten at school.
他率性放手一搏，反而取得了很好的成绩。
Tā shuàixìng fàngshǒu yìbó，fǎnér qǔdé le hěnhǎo de chéngjì。
He just fought without any further consideration, and got very good marks, contrary to all expectations.
今年我市的双拥工作取得了不错的成绩。　
Jīnnián wǒ shì de shuāngyōng gōngzuò qǔdé le búcuò de chéngjì。
We have done well in this year\'s &quot;double support&quot; (support the army and give preferential treatment to the families of revolutionary soldiers and martyrs; support the government and cherish the people) work.
我国的短道速滑运动员在这次冬运会上取得了优异的成绩。
Wǒ guó de duǎndào sùhuá yùndòngyuán zài zhècì dōngyùnhuì shàng qǔdé le yōuyì de chéngjì。
Our country\'s short-track speed skaters did very well in this winter Olympics.
承蒙抬爱，我将继续努力，争取取得更大的成绩。
Chéngméng tái\'ài，wǒ jiāng jìxù nǔlì，zhēngqǔ qǔdé gèngdà de chéngjì。
With your care and support, I will continue to work hard so as to achieve more.
我们要奖励那些业绩特出的人。
Wǒmen yào jiǎnglì nàxiē yèjì tèchū de rén。
We must reward those with outstanding performance.
由于工作成绩突出，他被老板提级了。
Yóuyú gōngzuò chéngjì tūchū，tā bèi lǎobǎn tíjí le。
Due to his excellent performance at work, he has been promoted by his boss.
还望各位同仁再接再厉，取得更好的成绩。
Hái wàng gè wèi tóngrén zàijiē zàilì，qǔdé gèng hǎo de chéngjì。
I hope that all my dear colleagues can go on working and achieve better results.
他因成绩出色被评为“青年突击手”。
Tā yīn chéngjì chūsè bèi píngwéi“qīngnián tūjīshǒu”。
He was entitled a &quot;Young Pace-Setter&quot; due to his excellent performance.
村民们利用先进设备拓垦荒地，成绩显著。
Cūnmínmen lìyòng xiānjìn shèbèi tuòkěn huāngdì，chéngjì xiǎnzhù。
The villagers used advanced instruments to open up wasteland, and have achieved notable results.
在目前已知成绩的参赛选手中，小刚位居第一。
Zài mùqián yǐzhī chéngjì de cānsài xuǎnshǒu zhōng，Xiǎo Gāng wèijū dìyī。
Xiao gang ranks first among the contestants who already got their results.
这学期你的成绩又下滑了，你该下力了！
Zhè xuéqī nǐ de chéngjì yòu xiàhuá le，nǐ gāi xiàlì le！
Your marks fell again this term, you should work harder.
因为学习成绩差，老师经常给他开设小锅饭，帮他补习功课。
Yīnwéi xuéxí chéngjì chà，lǎoshī jīngcháng gěi tā kāishè xiǎoguōfàn，bāng tā bǔxí gōngkè。
Due to his poor performance, the teacher often coaches him privately to help him catch up.
总成绩终于出来了，他也可以心定了。
Zǒngchéngjì zhōng yú chūlái le，tā yě kěyǐ xīndìng le。
He was finally assured when the results came out.
这支球队以不败的战绩雄居积分榜首。
Zhèzhī qiúduì yǐ búbài de zhànjì xióngjū jīfēn bǎngshǒu。
This team ranks first on the tally with an undefeated record.
他的成绩雄踞积分榜第一名，冠军非他莫属。
Tā de chéngjì xióngjù jīfēnbǎng dìyī míng，guànjūn fēi tā mòshǔ。
His marks top the tally. He must be the champion.
虽然小军上学期成绩不好，但这学期他迎头赶上了。

Though Xiaojun didn\'t do well last semester, he mananged to catch up with the others this semester.
小明在预考中取得了出人意料的好成绩。
Xiǎo Míng zài yùkǎo zhōng qǔdé le chūrén yìliào de hǎo chéngjì。
Xiaoming got unexpectedly good marks in the preliminary examination.
他的成绩中常，没有突破。
Tā de chéngjì zhōng cháng，méiyǒu tūpò。
His work at school is average and makes no breakthroughs.
她这样专擅影响了整体的成绩。
Tā zhèyàng zhuānshàn yǐngxiǎng le zhěngtǐ de chéngjì。
Her arbitrary acts have affected the performance of the entire team.
我国的自由体操在奥运会上取得过辉煌的成绩。

Our country\'s free exercise used to gain glorious achievements in the Olympic Games.
他英语成绩特别好，可是总分总是上不去。
Tā yīngyǔ chéngjì tèbié hǎo，kěshì zǒngfēn zǒngshì shàngbúqù。
He has good points in English, but his total mark is always quite low.
那次军事体育比赛中，他在“军事5项”的比赛中取得了良好成绩。

Students will only be able to do well if they study hard.

His school record is not satisfactory.

Nǐ bùnǔlì，chéngjìchà shì dāngránde。

成绩甚佳
chénɡjì shèn jiā
achieve very good results
成绩好的学生可以减免学费。
Chéngjì hǎo de xuéshengkěyǐ jiǎnmiǎn xuéfèi。
Students with high marks can enjoy a partial or total tuition waiver.
他因学习成绩优秀而受到奖赏。
Tā yīn xuéxí chénɡjì yōuxiù ér shòudào jiǎnɡshǎnɡ。
He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.
考查学生成绩
kǎochá xuéshengchéngjì
check students\' work
对已经取得的成绩不要夸大其词。
Duì yǐjing qǔdé de chéngjì bú yào kuādàqící。
We shouldn\'t overstate our past achievements.
在历次比赛中她都取得了优异的成绩。
Zài lìcì bǐsài zhōng tā dōu qǔdé le yōuyì de chéngjì。
She has done well in all past contests.
按比赛成绩排列名次
àn bǐsàichéngjì páilièmíngcì
arrange the names of contestants in the order of their results
抹杀成绩
mǒshā chéngjì
obliterate achievements
在平凡的岗位上做出不平凡的成绩
zài píngfán de gǎngwèi shàngzuòchū bùpíngfán de chéngjì
achieve extraordinary successes at an ordinary post
成绩平平。
Chénɡjì pínɡpínɡ。
The results are about up to the average.
把成绩作为继续前进的新起点
bǎ chéngjì zuòwéi jìxù qiánjìn de xīnqǐdiǎn
take achievements as starting points for further progress
对成绩和缺点作恰如其分的估计
duì chéngjì hé quēdiǎn zuò qiàrúqífèn de gūjì
make an appropriate estimate of the achievements and shortcomings
我们不能停留在现有的成绩上，要继续前进。
Wǒmen bùnéng tíngliú zài xiànyǒu de chéngjì shàng，yào jìxù qiánjìn。
We can\'t rest on our laurels; we must forge ahead.
别一有成绩就翘尾巴。
Bié yì yǒu chéngjì jiù qiàowěibā。
Don\'t get cocky when you\'ve achieved something.
我队以四胜两负一平的成绩获得亚军。
Wǒ duì yǐ sì shèng liǎng fù yì píng de chéngjì huòdé yàjūn。
Our team finished second with four wins, two defeats and one tie.
不要躺在过去的成绩上睡大觉。
Búyào tǎngzài guòqù de chéngjì shàng shuìdàjiào。
Don\'t rest content with past achievements. or Don\'t rest on your laurels.
我们不能陶醉于已取得的成绩。
Wǒmen bùnéng táozuì yú yǐ qǔdé de chéngjì。
We mustn\'t let success go to our heads.
成绩特异
chénɡjì tèyì 
an excellent record (or performance); extraordinary results
成绩无前
chéngjì wúqián 
an unprecedented succes
以优异成绩向国庆献礼
yǐ yōuyì chénɡjì xiànɡ ɡuóqìnɡ xiànlǐ
greet National Day with new and outstanding successes
合同期满后，成绩显著者续聘。
Hétongqī mǎn hòu，chéngjì xiǎnzhùzhě xù pìn。
Those who acquit themselves exceptionally well will have their contracts renewed.
这些成绩是不能一笔抹杀的。
Zhèxiē chéngjì shì bùnéng yìbǐ mǒshā de。
These achievements cannot be gainsaid.
成绩优良
chénɡjī yōuliánɡ 
get good marks; make a good showing
成绩优秀
chénɡjì yōuxiù 
get excellent results or marks
考试成绩优异
kǎoshì chénɡjì yōuyì 
do exceedingly well in an examination
成绩昭著
chéngjì zhāozhù 
have achieved signal successes
成绩卓然
chénɡjì zhuórán 
achieve outstanding results
你怎么能把集体取得的成绩看作个人的资本？
Nǐ zěnme néngbǎ jítǐ qǔdé de chéngjì kànzuò gèrén de zīběn? 
How could you capitalize on what the group has achieved?
只要努力，自然会取得好成绩。
Zhǐyào nǔlì，zìrán huì qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
If you work hard, you\'re bound to get good results.
她俩在班里的学习成绩差不大离。
Tā liǎ zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì chàbúdàlí。
They are equally good at their studies.
他虽然很努力了，但成绩还是那么不尽如人意。
Tā suīrán hěnnǔlì le，dàn chéngjì háishi nàme bújìnrú rényì。
Although he tried very hard, the results were not very satisfactory.
他的考试成绩跟及格线擦边。
Tā de kǎoshì chéngjì gēn jígéxiàn cābiān。
He passed the exam by a narrow margin.
他自小聪敏好学，成绩一直遥遥领先。
Tā zì xiǎo cōngmǐn hàoxué，chéngjì yìzhí yáoyáo lǐngxiān。
He has been clever and fond of studying since he was young, and way ahead of his peers in study.
他的学习成绩凑凑合合，也不太稳定。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì còucòuhéhé，yě bú tài wěndìng。
His study is not bad, but not very consistent.
等待高考成绩的日子，真是寸阴若岁。
Děngdài gāokǎo chéngjì de rìzi，zhēnshì cùnyīn ruòsuì。
During those days of waiting for the results of the College Entrance Exam, an inch in movement of a shadow seemed to be as long as a year.
他的单科成绩都是优秀。
Tā de dānkē chéngjì dōushì yōuxiù。
All of his courses are excellent.
他学习成绩太差，看来只能蹲班了。
Tā xuéxí chéngjì tài chà，kàn lái zhǐnéng dūnbān le。
He lags far behind in his studies, and cannot go up to the next grade.
小明的数学成绩不太好，每次考试都让他很犯难。
Xiǎo Míng de shùxué chéngjì bú tài hǎo，měi cì kǎoshì dōu ràng tā hěn fànnán。
Xiao Ming is not good at math and feels perplexed in each math exam.
小强虽然学习成绩不好，可同学们也不应该非笑他。
Xiǎoqiáng suīrán xuéxí chéngjì bùhǎo，kě tóngxuémen yě bùyīnggāi fēixiào tā。
Though Xiao Qiang is poor in his studies, he should not be ridiculed by his classmates.
今年高考，丽丽的成绩超过分数线很多，顺利地进入了理想中的大学。
Jīnnián gāokǎo，Lìlì de chéngjì chāoguò fēnshùxiàn hěn duō，shùnlì de jìnrù le lǐxiǎng zhōng de dàxué。
Lily\'s score was far above this year\'s cut-off mark and was successfully enrolled by her dream university.
选手们要求评委对他们的比赛成绩进行复评。
Xuǎnshǒumen yāoqiú píngwěi duì tāmen de bǐsài chéngjì jìnxíng fùpíng。
The athletes request that the judges reappraise them.
怕妈妈批评，小明改窜了他的数学成绩。
Pà māma pīpíng，Xiǎo Míng gǎicuàn le tā de shùxué chéngjì。
Xiao Ming changed his math score because he was afraid that his mom would criticize him.
老师已经把连续三次都没来上课的同学在名单中勾除，他们这学期就没有成绩了。
Lǎoshī yǐjing bǎ liánxù sān cì dōu méilái shàngkè de tóngxué zài míngdān zhōng gōuchú，tāmen zhè xuéqī jiù méiyǒu chéngjì le。
The teacher has deleted from the name list the names of the students who haven\'t shown up in class three times in succession, and they will not get scores for this semester.
她这次的竞赛成绩很好，没有孤负老师对她的希望。
Tā zhè cì de jìngsài chéngjì hěnhǎo，méiyǒu gūfù lǎoshī duì tā de xīwàng。
She hasn\'t let down the teacher\'s expectations for her and has done very well in this competition.
我的这点成绩哪值得如此夸奖，先生过誉了。
Wǒ de zhè diǎn chéngjì nǎ zhídé rúcǐ kuājiǎng，xiānshēng guòyù le。
You flatter me, me achievements are not worthy of such praise.
考试前，同学们互勉着，祝愿彼此取得好成绩。
Kǎoshì qián，tóngxuémen hùmiǎn zhe，zhùyuàn bǐcǐ qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
Before the exam, the students encouraged each other and wished each other a good score.
她以优异的成绩考入护校。
Tā yǐ yōuyì de chéngjì kǎorù hùxiào。
She entered a nursing school with an excellent score.
即或是我们取得了一些成绩，也不能骄傲。
Jíhuò shì wǒmen qǔdé le yìxiē chéngjì，yě bùnéng jiāo\'ào。
We should not be conceited even if we have achieved some success.
我是高二的学生，急待提高语文成绩。
Wǒ shì gāoèr de xuésheng，jídài tígāo yǔwén chéngjì。
As a student of Grade Two at a high school, I urgently want to improve my Chinese.
由于工作成绩突出，公司奖授了他一台电脑。
Yóuyú gōngzuò chéngjì tūchū，gōngsī jiǎngshòu le tā yìtái diànnǎo。
He was awarded a computer for his outstanding performance in his work.
只取得了一点小成绩他就变得很骄慢。
Zhǐ qǔdé le yìdiǎn xiǎochéngjì tā jiù biàn de hěnjiāomàn。
He became overly proud after he has made a small achievement.
只取得了一点点成绩他就开始矜功自伐。
Zhǐ qǔdé le yìdiǎndiǎn chéngjì tā jiù kāishǐ jīngōngzìfá。
He bega to flatter himself after a little achievement.
由于考试成绩不佳，他被这所高校拒之门外。
Yóuyú kǎoshì chéngjì bùjiā，tā bèi zhè suǒ gāoxiào jùzhīménwài。
He was refused by the college because of his bad examination results.
实施军民共建以来，军民之间互相帮助，出了很多成绩。
Shíshī jūnmín gòngjiàn yǐlái，jūnmín zhījiān hùxiāng bāngzhù，chū le hěnduō chéngjì。
Since the implementation of the policy of the co-construction of the army and the people, the army and the people have helped each other and have made a lot of achievements.
考学时谁不想考个好成绩、考上个好学校呢？
Kǎoxué shí shéi bùxiǎng kǎo gè hǎo chéngjì、kǎoshàng gè hǎo xuéxiào ne？
When taking the entrance examination, who does not want to have a good result and get into a good school?
他在期终考试中，科第成绩平均都在90分。
Tā zài qī zhōng kǎoshì zhōng，kēdì chéngjì píngjūn dōu zài jiǔshífēn。
In the final exams, his average grade was above 90 points.
今年他家因为科学养牛成绩突出而被县里评为了科技示范户。
Jīnnián tā jiā yīnwèi kēxué yǎngniú chéngjì tūchū ér bèi xiànlǐ píngwéi le kējì shìfàn hù。
This year, his family was awarded the title of scientific and technological example by the county because of their excellent performance in scientifically raising cattle.
她成绩这么优秀，可以说考上一所名牌大学是没问题的。
Tā chéngjì zhème yōuxiù，kěyǐ shuō kǎoshàng yìsuǒ míngpái dàxué shì méi wèntí de。
She does exceedingly well in her studies and should have no problem being admitted to a prestigious university.
他可着劲儿猛跑，可还是没有跑出好成绩。
Tā kě zhe jìnr měngpǎo，kě háishi méiyǒu pǎochū hǎo chéngjì。
He ran at top speed, but didn\'t get a good result.
我的学习成绩上去得很快，妈妈很宽怀！
Wǒ de xuéxí chéngjì shàngqù de hěnkuài，māma hěnkuānhuái！
Mom feels relieved that my school record has improved rapidly.
我们中国女排之所以能够一直成绩不错是因为我们打球方式不老套，善于变化。
Wǒmen Zhōngguó nǚpái zhīsuǒyǐ nénggòu yìzhí chéngjì búcuò shì yīnwèi wǒmen dǎqiú fāngshì bùlǎotào，shànyú biànhuà。
The Chinese volleyball team can achieve good results all the time because we don\'t stick to outdated playing mode, instead we are very flexible.
由于学习成绩优秀，他被批准躐等升级。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì yōuxiù,tā bèi pīzhǔn lièděng shēngjí.
Because of excellent grades, he was approved to skip  the normal steps to go up to a higher grade.
我的高考成绩仅比录取线低6分。
Wǒ de gāokǎo chéngjì jǐn bǐ lùqūxiàn dī liùfēn。
My mark in the college entrance examination was only six marks lower than the passing mark.
他在班里的学习成绩一直都是冒尖的。
Tā zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì yìzhí dōushì màojiān de。
He has been top notch in his class.
他的学习成绩很好，总在班里名列前茅。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì hěnhǎo，zǒng zài bān lǐ mínglièqiánmáo。
He does exceedingly well in his studies, and has always been heading the class.
他学习那般刻苦，可学习成绩却依然很糟。
Tā xuéxí nàbān kèkǔ，kě xuéxí chéngjì què yīrán hěnzāo。
Though he studies hard, he performs badly.
经过教练的耐心劝导，她终于抛舍了紧张情绪，赛出了好成绩。
Jīngguò jiàoliàn de nàixīn quàndǎo，tā zhōng yú pāoshě le jǐnzhāng qíngxù，sàichū le hǎo chéngjì。
After her coach\'s patient exhortations, her pressure finally eased and she achieved a good result.
小明的期中考试成绩很好，受到老师表扬。
Xiǎo Míng de qī zhōng kǎoshì chéngjì hěnhǎo，shòudào lǎoshī biǎoyáng。
Xiao Ming got high marks in the mid-term exam, and was praised by the teacher.
为了期终能考出好成绩，我们每天都努力学习。
Wèile qī zhōng néng kǎochū hǎo chéngjì，wǒmen měitiān dōu nǔlì xuéxí。
To get high marks in the final exam, we study hard every day.
刚有了点儿成绩，他就窃窃自喜起来。
Gāng yǒu le diǎnr chéngjì，tā jiù qièqiè zìxǐ qǐlái。
He began to feel glad secretly when there was just a little achievement.
他为官勤政爱民，取得了许多成绩。
Tā wéiguān qínzhèng àimín，qǔdé le xǔduō chéngjì。
He is assiduous in government affairs, loves the people, and has made a lot of achievements.
你能有今天的成绩，不可轻忽他的帮助。
Nǐ néng yǒu jīntiān de chéngjì，bùkě qīnghū tā de bāngzhù。
You have him to thank for today\'s achievements, you shouldn\'t overlook his help.
各部门联合展开的扫黄打非活动成绩斐然。
Gè bùmén liánhé zhǎnkāi de sǎohuáng dǎfēi huódòng chéngjì fěirán。
The joint efforts of different departments to sweep illegal porno publications have achieved great success.
由于我工作成绩突出，公司赏赉给我一套新房。
Yóuyú wǒ gōngzuò chéngjì tūchū，gōngsī shǎnglài gěi wǒ yítào xīnfáng。
The company rewarded me a new department suite for my outstanding achievements.
你今年的学习成绩一定要上台阶。
Nǐ jīnnián de xuéxí chéngjì yídìng yào shàng táijiē。
You must make progress in your studies this year.
由于学习成绩下降，我被父亲申饬了。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì xiàjiàng，wǒ bèi fùqīn shēnchì le。
I was blamed by my father due to the worsening of my study.
父亲深望我能取得更好的学习成绩。
Fùqīn shēnwàng wǒ néng qǔdé gènghǎo de xuéxí chéngjì。
My father sincerely hopes that I can do better in study.
他是个事务主义的领导，每天都很辛苦，但就是不见成绩。
Tā shì gè shìwùzhǔyì de lǐngdǎo，měitiān dōu hěnxīnkǔ，dàn jiùshì bújiàn chéngjì。
He is a routinist leader, who works hard every day, but without achievements.
明天就要进考场了，试看咱们谁能考出更好的成绩。
Míngtiān jiùyào jìn kǎochǎng le，shìkàn zánmen shéi néng kǎochū gènghǎo de chéngjì。
We\'ll take the examination tomorrow, and let\'s see who can get a higher mark.
他是班里的文艺骨干，但学习成绩不怎么样。
Tā shì bān lǐ de wényì gǔgàn，dàn xuéxí chéngjì bùzěnmeyàng。
He is a mainstay of literature and art in class, but doesn\'t do well in study.
在学校时，他的学习成绩数得上前10名。
Zài xuéxiào shí，tā de xuéxí chéngjì shǔdéshàng qiánshímíng。
His study results are among the top ten at school.
他率性放手一搏，反而取得了很好的成绩。
Tā shuàixìng fàngshǒu yìbó，fǎnér qǔdé le hěnhǎo de chéngjì。
He just fought without any further consideration, and got very good marks, contrary to all expectations.
今年我市的双拥工作取得了不错的成绩。　
Jīnnián wǒ shì de shuāngyōng gōngzuò qǔdé le búcuò de chéngjì。
We have done well in this year\'s &quot;double support&quot; (support the army and give preferential treatment to the families of revolutionary soldiers and martyrs; support the government and cherish the people) work.
我国的短道速滑运动员在这次冬运会上取得了优异的成绩。
Wǒ guó de duǎndào sùhuá yùndòngyuán zài zhècì dōngyùnhuì shàng qǔdé le yōuyì de chéngjì。
Our country\'s short-track speed skaters did very well in this winter Olympics.
承蒙抬爱，我将继续努力，争取取得更大的成绩。
Chéngméng tái\'ài，wǒ jiāng jìxù nǔlì，zhēngqǔ qǔdé gèngdà de chéngjì。
With your care and support, I will continue to work hard so as to achieve more.
由于工作成绩突出，他被老板提级了。
Yóuyú gōngzuò chéngjì tūchū，tā bèi lǎobǎn tíjí le。
Due to his excellent performance at work, he has been promoted by his boss.
还望各位同仁再接再厉，取得更好的成绩。
Hái wàng gè wèi tóngrén zàijiē zàilì，qǔdé gèng hǎo de chéngjì。
I hope that all my dear colleagues can go on working and achieve better results.
他因成绩出色被评为“青年突击手”。
Tā yīn chéngjì chūsè bèi píngwéi“qīngnián tūjīshǒu”。
He was entitled a &quot;Young Pace-Setter&quot; due to his excellent performance.
村民们利用先进设备拓垦荒地，成绩显著。
Cūnmínmen lìyòng xiānjìn shèbèi tuòkěn huāngdì，chéngjì xiǎnzhù。
The villagers used advanced instruments to open up wasteland, and have achieved notable results.
在目前已知成绩的参赛选手中，小刚位居第一。
Zài mùqián yǐzhī chéngjì de cānsài xuǎnshǒu zhōng，Xiǎo Gāng wèijū dìyī。
Xiao gang ranks first among the contestants who already got their results.
这学期你的成绩又下滑了，你该下力了！
Zhè xuéqī nǐ de chéngjì yòu xiàhuá le，nǐ gāi xiàlì le！
Your marks fell again this term, you should work harder.
因为学习成绩差，老师经常给他开设小锅饭，帮他补习功课。
Yīnwéi xuéxí chéngjì chà，lǎoshī jīngcháng gěi tā kāishè xiǎoguōfàn，bāng tā bǔxí gōngkè。
Due to his poor performance, the teacher often coaches him privately to help him catch up.
总成绩终于出来了，他也可以心定了。
Zǒngchéngjì zhōng yú chūlái le，tā yě kěyǐ xīndìng le。
He was finally assured when the results came out.
他的成绩雄踞积分榜第一名，冠军非他莫属。
Tā de chéngjì xióngjù jīfēnbǎng dìyī míng，guànjūn fēi tā mòshǔ。
His marks top the tally. He must be the champion.
虽然小军上学期成绩不好，但这学期他迎头赶上了。
Suīrán Xiǎo Jūn shàng xuéqī chéngjì bùhǎo，dàn zhè xuéqī tā yíngtóu gǎnshàng le。
Though Xiaojun didn\'t do well last semester, he mananged to catch up with the others this semester.
小明在预考中取得了出人意料的好成绩。
Xiǎo Míng zài yùkǎo zhōng qǔdé le chūrén yìliào de hǎo chéngjì。
Xiaoming got unexpectedly good marks in the preliminary examination.
他的成绩中常，没有突破。
Tā de chéngjì zhōng cháng，méiyǒu tūpò。
His work at school is average and makes no breakthroughs.
她这样专擅影响了整体的成绩。
Tā zhèyàng zhuānshàn yǐngxiǎng le zhěngtǐ de chéngjì。
Her arbitrary acts have affected the performance of the entire team.
我国的自由体操在奥运会上取得过辉煌的成绩。

Quarterly reporting is already the norm on the mainland.
zài Zhōngguó Nèidì，jìdù yèjìbàogào yǐ chéngwéi biāozhǔn。
在中国内地，季度业绩报告已成为标准。
The criteria against which to measure success are termed performance indicators.
Yònglái héngliáng chénggōng de biāozhǔn chēngwéi yèjì zhǐbiāo。
用来衡量成功的标准称为业绩指标。
The key evidence of success is the financial results.
Chénggōng de zhǔyào zhèngmíng shì yèjì。
成功的主要证明是业绩。
屡遭败绩
lǚzāobàijì
be badly defeated again and again; have sustained severe defeats time and again
教练无能，该队屡遭败绩。
Jiàoliàn wúnéng，gāi duì lǚ zāo bàijì。
The coach was incompetent and the team suffered repeated defeats.
这支球队以不败的战绩雄居积分榜首。
Zhèzhī qiúduì yǐ búbài de zhànjì xióngjū jīfēn bǎngshǒu。
This team ranks first on the tally with an undefeated record.
齐师败绩。
The press trumpeted another defeat for the government.
Méitǐ dàlì xuānyáng zhèngfǔ de yòu yí bàijì。
媒体大力宣扬政府的又一败绩。
She beat some tough competition for the number one slot.
Tā yǐ dì-yī míng de chéngjì jībàile xǔduō yǒulì de jìngzhēngduìshǒu。
他以第一名的成绩击败了许多有力的竞争对手。

这是徐悲鸿的真迹。

李鸿章被有的史学家称为国贼。
Lǐ Hóngzhāng bèi yǒu de shǐxuéjiā chēngwéi guózéi。
Some historians refer Li Hongzhang as a national traitor.
近日他收到家中来鸿，让他回家过年。
Jìnrì tā shōudào jiā zhōng láihóng，ràng tā huíjiā guònián。
Several days before, he had received a letter from his family who asked him to return for the Spring Festival.
谈笑有鸿儒，往来无白丁。这是唐朝诗人刘禹锡的名句。
Tánxiào yǒu hóngrú，wǎnglái wú báidīng。Zhè shì Tángcháo shīrén Liú Yǔxī de míngjù。
&quot;Erudite scholars come in good spirits to talk with me, and among my guests there are no uneducated common people.&quot;  This is a famous sentence by the poet Liu Yuxi of Tang Dynasty.
